TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BinaryFormatter extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter, class System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter
Public NotInheritable Class BinaryFormatter Implements IRemotingFormatter

summary.span: 以二進位格式將物件或連接物件的整個圖形序列化和還原序列化。

span.span: Serializes and deserializes an object, or an entire graph of connected objects, in binary format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和類別會實作介面，以支援遠端程序呼叫 (Rpc)，而介面 (由繼承) 若要支援序列化的物件圖形。The and classes implement the interface to support remote procedure calls (RPCs), and the interface (inherited by the ) to support serialization of a graph of objects. 類別也支援使用 Rpc物件，而不使用功能。The class also supports RPCs with objects, without using the functionality. Rpc 的期間介面可讓兩個不同的物件圖形的規格： 要序列化的物件圖形和包含的標頭 （適用於遠端函式呼叫的相關資訊的物件陣列的其他圖形例如，交易識別碼或方法簽章）。During RPCs, the interface allows the specification of two separate object graphs: the graph of objects to serialize, and an additional graph that contains an array of header objects that convey information about the remote function call (for example, transaction ID or a method signature). 使用的 Rpc分成兩個不同的部分： 方法呼叫，會傳送到遠端的物件，其中包含呼叫之方法的伺服器，這個方法的回應，從伺服器傳送到用戶端狀態和回應從被呼叫的方法資訊。RPCs that use the separate into two distinct parts: method calls, which are sent to the server with the remote object that contains the method called, and method responses, which are sent from the server to the client with the status and response information from the called method. 在還原序列化方法呼叫期間的物件圖形的第一個物件必須支援介面。During serialization of a method call the first object of the object graph must support the interface. 若要還原序列化方法呼叫，請使用方法參數。To deserialize a method call, use the method with the parameter. 遠端執行功能基礎結構使用產生支援的物件，委派介面。The remoting infrastructure uses the delegate to produce an object that supports the interface. 當叫用委派，它會傳回遠端物件的 URI 所呼叫的方法。When the invokes the delegate, it returns the URI of the remote object with the method that is being called. 在第一個傳回的物件圖形中支援介面。The first object in the graph returned supports the interface. 方法回應的序列化程序是相同的方法呼叫，除了第一個物件的物件圖形必須支援介面。The serialization procedure for a method response is identical to that of a method call, except the first object of the object graph must support the interface. 若要還原序列化方法回應，請使用方法。To deserialize a method response, use the method. 為了節省時間，呼叫端物件的相關詳細資料不會在方法呼叫期間遠端物件傳送。To save time, details about the caller object are not sent to the remote object during the method call. 這些詳細資料會改為取得從原始的方法呼叫會傳遞至方法中的參數。These details are instead obtained from the original method call, which is passed to the method in the parameter. 所傳回的圖形中的第一個物件方法可支援介面。The first object in the graph returned by the method supports the interface. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用不受信任的資料還原序列化的二進位序列化可能會導致安全性風險。Using binary serialization to deserialize untrusted data can lead to security risks. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料驗證](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation). ## 未配對的代理Unpaired Surrogates 二進位序列化中不會遺失任何未配對的 surrogate 字元。Any unpaired surrogate characters are lost in binary serialization. 例如，下列字串包含高 surrogate 的 Unicode 字元`(\ud800`) 兩者之間`Test`單字：For example, the following string contains a high surrogate Unicode character `(\ud800`) in between the two `Test` words: `Test\ud800Test` 在序列化之前位元組字串陣列，如下所示：Before serialization, the byte array of the string is as follows: |位元組陣列值Byte Array Value|字元Character| |----------------------|---------------| |8484|TT| |101101|ee| |115115|秒s| |116116|tt| |5529655296|\ud800\ud800| |8484|TT| |101101|ee| |115115|秒s| |116116|tt| 在還原序列化後, 的高 surrogate 的 Unicode 字元是遺失：After deserialization, the high surrogate Unicode character is lost: |位元組陣列值Byte Array Value|字元Character| |----------------------|---------------| |8484|TT| |101101|ee| |115115|秒s| |116116|tt| |8484|TT| |101101|ee| |115115|秒s| |116116|tt| ## Examples [!code-cpp[BinaryFormatterClass Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/BinaryFormatterClass Example/CPP/binaryformatter.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[BinaryFormatterClass Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/BinaryFormatterClass Example/CS/binaryformatter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[BinaryFormatterClass Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/BinaryFormatterClass Example/VB/binaryformatter.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a given surrogate selector and streaming context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始化新`BinaryFormatter`進行序列化或還原序列化的物件，從指定。Initializes a new `BinaryFormatter` for serialization or deserialization of objects from the specified . 在序列化或還原序列化程序使用指定搜尋想要還原序列化的物件類型與您已註冊的 surrogate。The serialization or deserialization process uses the specified to search for surrogates that are registered for the object types you want to deserialize. 代理是 helper 的序列化和還原序列化特定類別的物件。Surrogates are helpers that serialize and deserialize objects of specific classes. 預設值無法處理從衍生的物件序列化進行遠端處理。The default cannot handle the serialization of objects that derive from the for remoting purposes. 在遠端處理的情況下指定取代物件衍生自與序列化時所指定的代理選取器的物件。In a remoting situation the specified replaces the object derived from with a object that is serialized by the specified surrogate selector. 因此，如果您想要使用遠端物件時，設定`selector`參數的執行個體。Therefore, if you want to use remote objects, set the `selector` parameter to an instance of . 如果您不需要 (instance)，設定`selector`參數必須為`null`。If you do not need surrogates, set the `selector` parameter to be `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供列舉，描述來源和目的地指定的序列化資料流，以及保留該內容和其他呼叫端定義的內容序列化的方式。The provides an enumeration that describes the source and the destination for a given serialized stream, as well as a way for serialization to retain that context and an additional caller-defined context.

summary.span: 將資料流還原序列化至物件圖形。

span.span: Deserializes a stream into an object graph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 呼叫此方法不受信任的資料時，會造成安全性風險。Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk. 呼叫這個方法僅使用信任的資料。Call this method only with trusted data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料驗證](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 成功的還原序列化資料流中目前的位置必須是物件圖形的開頭。For successful deserialization, the current position in the stream must be at the beginning of the object graph. > [!IMPORTANT] > 呼叫此方法不受信任的資料時，會造成安全性風險。Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk. 呼叫這個方法僅使用信任的資料。Call this method only with trusted data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料驗證](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation). ## Examples [!code-cpp[BinaryFormatterClass Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/BinaryFormatterClass Example/CPP/binaryformatter.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[BinaryFormatterClass Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/BinaryFormatterClass Example/CS/binaryformatter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[BinaryFormatterClass Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/BinaryFormatterClass Example/VB/binaryformatter.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫端物件的相關詳細資料不會在方法呼叫期間傳送遠端物件。Details about the caller object are not sent to the remote object during the method call. 相反地，這些詳細資料從傳遞至目前的方法中的原始方法呼叫中取得`methodCallMessage`參數。Instead, these details are obtained from the original method call that is passed to the current method in the `methodCallMessage` parameter. 為了成功還原序列化資料流中目前的位置必須是物件圖形的開頭。In order for deserialization to succeed the current position in the stream must be at the beginning of the object graph.

MemberSignature.Value: public object UnsafeDeserialize (System.IO.Stream serializationStream, System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.HeaderHandler handler);
.method public hidebysig instance object UnsafeDeserialize(class System.IO.Stream serializationStream, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.HeaderHandler handler) cil managed
Public Function UnsafeDeserialize (serializationStream As Stream, handler As HeaderHandler) As Object
public: System::Object ^ UnsafeDeserialize(System::IO::Stream ^ serializationStream, System::Runtime::Remoting::Messaging::HeaderHandler ^ handler);

param.name: serializationStream
param.span: 要還原序列化物件圖形的來源資料流。

span.span: The stream from which to deserialize the object graph.

param.name: handler
param.span: 處理 serializationStream 中所有標頭的 。

span.span: The that handles any headers in the serializationStream.

param.span: 可以是 。

span.span: Can be .

summary.span: 將指定的資料流還原序列化至物件圖形。

span.span: Deserializes the specified stream into an object graph.

summary.span: 所提供的 會處理該資料流中的任何標頭。

span.span: The provided handles any headers in that stream.

returns.span: 物件圖形的已還原序列化物件或最上層物件 (根)。

span.span: The deserialized object or the top object (root) of the object graph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 標頭只能用於特定的遠端處理應用程式。Headers are used only for specific remoting applications. 這個方法會使用以防止它不受信任程式碼呼叫，立即呼叫端必須要有權限。This method uses to prevent it from being called from untrusted code; only the immediate caller is required to have permission. 如果您的程式碼可以呼叫從部分信任程式碼不使用這個方法。Do not use this method if your code can be called from partially trusted code. 在部分信任案例中，使用改為。In partially trusted scenarios, use instead. 在完全信任情況下，提供較佳的效能比。In full trust scenarios, provides better performance than . 成功的還原序列化資料流中目前的位置必須是物件圖形的開頭。For successful deserialization, the current position in the stream must be at the beginning of the object graph. > [!IMPORTANT] > 呼叫此方法不受信任的資料時，會造成安全性風險。Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk. 呼叫這個方法僅使用信任的資料。Call this method only with trusted data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料驗證](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).

exception.span: 為 。

span.span: The is .

exception.span: 支援搜尋，但是其長度為 0。

span.span: The supports seeking, but its length is 0.

exception.span: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

span.span: The caller does not have the required permission.
To provide serialization services.
Associated enumeration: .

MemberSignature.Value: public object UnsafeDeserializeMethodResponse (System.IO.Stream serializationStream, System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.HeaderHandler handler, System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage methodCallMessage);

.method public hidebysig instance object UnsafeDeserializeMethodResponse(class System.IO.Stream serializationStream, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.HeaderHandler handler, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage methodCallMessage) cil managed
Public Function UnsafeDeserializeMethodResponse (serializationStream As Stream, handler As HeaderHandler, methodCallMessage As IMethodCallMessage) As Object

public: System::Object ^ UnsafeDeserializeMethodResponse(System::IO::Stream ^ serializationStream, System::Runtime::Remoting::Messaging::HeaderHandler ^ handler, System::Runtime::Remoting::Messaging::IMethodCallMessage ^ methodCallMessage);

param.name: serializationStream
param.span: 要還原序列化物件圖形的來源資料流。

span.span: The stream from which to deserialize the object graph.

param.name: handler
param.span: 處理 serializationStream 中所有標頭的 。

span.span: The that handles any headers in the serializationStream.

param.span: 可以是 。

span.span: Can be .

param.name: methodCallMessage
param.span: ，包含呼叫來源的相關詳細資料。

span.span: The that contains details about where the call came from.

summary.span: 將回應還原序列化至來自所提供 的遠端方法呼叫。

span.span: Deserializes a response to a remote method call from the provided .

returns.span: 對遠端方法呼叫的還原序列化回應。

span.span: The deserialized response to the remote method call.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫端物件的相關詳細資料不會在方法呼叫期間傳送遠端物件。Details about the caller object are not sent to the remote object during the method call. 相反地，這些詳細資料從傳遞至目前的方法中的原始方法呼叫中取得`methodCallMessage`參數。Instead, these details are obtained from the original method call that is passed to the current method in the `methodCallMessage` parameter. 這個方法會使用以防止它不受信任程式碼呼叫，立即呼叫端必須要有權限。This method uses to prevent it from being called from untrusted code; only the immediate caller is required to have permission. 如果您的程式碼可以呼叫從部分信任程式碼不使用這個方法。Do not use this method if your code can be called from partially trusted code. 在部分信任案例中，使用改為。In partially trusted scenarios, use instead. 在完全信任情況下，提供較佳的效能比。In full trust scenarios, provides better performance than . 成功的還原序列化資料流中目前的位置必須是物件圖形的開頭。For successful deserialization, the current position in the stream must be at the beginning of the object graph. > [!IMPORTANT] > 呼叫此方法不受信任的資料時，會造成安全性風險。Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk. 呼叫這個方法僅使用信任的資料。Call this method only with trusted data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料驗證](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).

exception.span: 為 。

span.span: The is .

exception.span: 支援搜尋，但是其長度為 0。

span.span: The supports seeking, but its length is 0.

exception.span: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

span.span: The caller does not have the required permission.
To provide serialization services.
